LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMateMtbHours: Adjust the mean time before an animal will mate A value of 0 disables mating
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMateMtbHoursGlobal: Set a modifier for all animals to adjust the mean time before the animal will mate Very small modifiers can cause the time become 0, which disables mating
